{"step_by_step_thinking": "The mesonephros is an embryonic structure that contributes to the development of the urinary and reproductive systems. The paroophoron, vas deferens, and epididymis are all structures that are derived from the mesonephros and are part of the reproductive system. The glomerulus, on the other hand, is a part of the kidney and is derived from the metanephros, not the mesonephros.", "answer_choice": "D. Glomerulus"}
